channel.title: Https on Ponte Posterum
channel.description: Recent content in Https on Ponte Posterum

item.title: Nginx 2
item.description: Nginx ~ Enabling HTTPS In the previous nginx blog I covered how to host a static website on the droplet that also serves my simple Go web application. This blog is going to cover how to enable HTTPS via LetsEncrypt for the site. I am going to be following a medium blog by jgefroh. Since I already have the site up and running I am going to skip most of the content leading up to enabling HTTPS.
